title: Cathie Wood Sees Bitcoin Going to $500,000
itunes:title: Cathie Wood Sees Bitcoin Going to $500,000
description:
Ark Invest’s Founder, CEO and CIO Cathie Wood discusses why she thinks Bitcoin will go to $500,000, addresses environmental concerns and explains that her team thinks renewable energy sources can be offloaded into Bitcoin mining.

Hosts: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
